attributes.action: use his influence to overrule Scottish Natural Heritage in their arrogant decision to cull pefectly healthy hedgehogs on the Isles of North and South Uist and Benbecula
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Each year SNH culls healthy hedgehogs in the Hebrides, despite the fact that, as demonstrated by Uist Hedgehog Rescue, The Briitsh Hedgehog Preservation Society, SPCA, and many many others, relocation of these animals to the mainland would be both more humane and less costly to the taxpayer.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "use his influence to overrule Scottish Natural Heritage in their arrogant decision to cull pefectly healthy hedgehogs on the Isles of North and South Uist and Benbecula."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number-10.gov.uk/output/Page11661.asp

Prime Minister's Office
